snippet: Even after revealing their identities, the two founders of the music collective Jungle say they see their group as a haven from seeking adulation.
abstract: Snapshot interview with Josh Lloyd-Watson and Tom McFarland, founders of British electronic music collective Jungle, who discuss their self-titled debut album and upcoming tour.
lead_paragraph: Even after revealing their identities, the two founders of the music collective Jungle say they see their group as a haven from seeking adulation.

headline.seo: Identities Revealed, Jungle Is Releasing a New Album
headline.main: Dropping the Mask, With Egos in Check
headline.print_headline: Dropping the Mask, With Egos in Check
